mapper.insert: insert into invoices (invoice_id, company_id, subscription_id, invoice_no, amount_total, currency, status, issued_at, due_at, e_invoice_url, created_at) values (#{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amountTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dueAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eInvoiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update invoices set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subscription_id = #{subscriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_at = #{issuedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, due_at = #{dueAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, e_invoice_url = #{eInvoiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select invoice_id, company_id, subscription_id, invoice_no, amount_total, currency, status, issued_at, due_at, e_invoice_url, created_at from invoices where invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
